metadata.title: CVE-2023-31438 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue was discovered in systemd 253. An attacker cantruncate a sealed log file and then resume log sealing such that checkingthe integrity shows no error, despite modifications. NOTE: the vendorreportedly sent "a reply denying that any of the finding was a securityvulnerability."

criterions.comment: systemd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
